ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If you love computer graphics and want to learn what it takes to do anything significant in this field, take this course. It will teach you the basics (be warned though, they are more technical than you think).
Yes, if he is interested in rendering.
I will recommend CPSC578. Even if a student doesn't like Graphics, he should not miss CPSC578.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It refreshes and reintroduces me to the fundamentals of computer graphics.
Graphics is interesting. I learned basic concepts of several rendering models and techniques.
